cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 55 miles ESE of Cayo Largo, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across central-western Cuba today, then turning north-northwest toward the Florida Keys and up the west coast of Florida before recurving along the U.S. Southeast coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane/Tropical-storm watches posted only for parts of Cuba, the Florida Keys and the west coast of Florida â€“ none for the Virgin Islands
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane/Tropical-storm warnings confined to portions of Cuba and the Florida Keys/Florida west coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Cuba, Florida Keys, west coast of Florida, and later coastal Georgia-Carolinas
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix; only occasional squalls possible from distant rain bands
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall forecast for St. Croix associated with Elsa
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor long-period swells possible in regional shipping lanes, but operational impact at the port should be negligible
